MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.PercentileMetric> ListMetrics (this Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.IPercentileTargetOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string accountName, string targetRegion, string filter);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.PercentileMetric> ListMetrics(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.IPercentileTargetOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string accountName, string targetRegion, string filter) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function ListMetrics (operations As IPercentileTargetOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, targetRegion As String, filter As String) As IEnumerable(Of PercentileMetric)
static member ListMetrics : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.IPercentileTargetOperations * string * string * string * string -> seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.PercentileMetric>

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
Target region to which data is written. Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given account target region. This url is only for PBS and Replication Latency data
